about.summary: A programmatic interface to the Web Service methods provided by Bold Systems (<http://www.boldsystems.org/>) for genetic 'barcode' data. Functions include methods for searching by sequences by taxonomic names, ids, collectors, and institutions; as well as a function for searching for specimens, and downloading trace files.

A programmatic interface to the Web Service methods provided by Bold Systems (<http://www.boldsystems.org/>) for genetic 'barcode' data. Functions include methods for searching by sequences by taxonomic names, ids, collectors, and institutions; as well as a function for searching for specimens, and downloading trace files.

name: r-bold
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.3.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-bold
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/bold_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/bold/bold_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0ead11d4386c4c0cd578d3a956f809db2001e387e449a431b4ad503f3da38f5f

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  script: R CMD INSTALL --build .
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-crul >=0.3.8
    - r-data.table
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-plyr
    - r-reshape
    - r-stringr
    - r-tibble
    - r-xml2
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-crul >=0.3.8
    - r-data.table
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-plyr
    - r-reshape
    - r-stringr
    - r-tibble
    - r-xml2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('bold')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('bold')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/ropensci/bold
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A programmatic interface to the Web Service methods provided by Bold Systems (<http://www.boldsystems.org/>) for genetic 'barcode' data. Functions include methods for searching by sequences by taxonomic names, ids, collectors, and institutions; as well as a function for searching for specimens, and downloading
    trace files.
  license_family: MIT

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ocefpaf
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: bold
# Title: Interface to Bold Systems API
# Description: A programmatic interface to the Web Service methods provided by Bold Systems (<http://www.boldsystems.org/>) for genetic 'barcode' data. Functions include methods for searching by sequences by taxonomic names, ids, collectors, and institutions; as well as a function for searching for specimens, and downloading trace files.

# LazyData: yes

# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# X-schema.org-applicationCategory: Data Access
